meta.name: EVITAvsEVITA
meta.about:
EKEE a.k.a.伊維特：作家（血腥黑暗故事），前903DJ，直覺塔羅師（導師），魔法師。
加拿大安省美術設計學院畢業。
假才女，全職文字，藝術，音樂創作。
心腸好但口賤，遲早落地獄。

EKEE is an author (short gore stories), Psychic card reader, witch, former commercial radio 903DJ. Graduated from Ontario College of Art and Design. EKEE does spiritual work, teach mandala drawing class, spell workshops and also tarot card reading. EKEE is preparing for her first art exhibition in Oct.

Job booking email: Miss Chan ahnammm@gmail.com
Tarot booking WhatsApp only: 9768-5388
